channel.title: St Vrain Archery Club
channel.description: Recent content on St Vrain Archery Club

item.description: Work needed to be done (May, 2016) Some tasks have volunteers, some tasks may be combined, so contact Stets or Matt to volunteer and schedule: Stets Newcomb Phone: 303-775-3589 Email: stets.newcomb@mesanetworks.net Kevin Lamar Phone: 303-717-1442 Email: klamar83@aol.com Ongoing as needed Mow lanes with deck mower (ATV or large riding mower or small tractor required) – several volunteers on list Mow around targets, bow hangars and shooting positions where deck cannot reach (club’s push mower) One-time projects Repair and paint retired 3D targets for use in broadhead positions
